name: HiKoB

overview:
HiKoB is a leading provider of wireless and scalable instrumentation systems that generate strategic data and information on your physical resources and assets to feed your information system.

“capture your environment and put it into your information system”

HiKoB provides two main offerings:

  • hardware and software tools for innovation and research in embedded wireless measure in the fields of motion capture, AHRS, biomechanics and biologging.

  • wireless instrumentation systems for smart cities, intelligent transport systems, intelligent parking and infrastructure monitoring.

HiKoB has been funded by a team of seasoned researchers of the French research institute on information and communication technology (INRIA) and the leading French engineering school INSA. With a +15 years of cumulated experience in the field of wireless sensors networks, HiKoB brings a strong track records of more than 2000 wireless sensor nodes deployed at an operational level.
